import { Card, CardActions, Button, Box, Typography, CardContent, Rating, InputBase } from "@mui/material"; import React from "react"; import '../card/card.css'; import FavoriteIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Favorite'; import card from '../card/card.jpg' import image from '../Books/images/book.png' function Books(props) { const clickMe =(obj)=>{ props.listenToBooks(obj) } return ( clickMe(props.book)}> < img src={image} style={{ width:200, height:200, position:'relative', top:10 }}/> {props.currentBook.bookName} {props.currentBook.author}
4.5*
({props.currentBook.quantity}) {props.currentBook.price} *Book Detail {props.currentBook.description} Customer Feedback Overall rating ) } export default Books
